Table.vch_DocDescription: One (1) self signed (on the front side) recent color passport size photograph to be affixed in the CAF (College Copy).
HSC Mark Sheets-cum-Provisional Certificate (or equivalent Board).
HSC Mark Sheets-cum-Provisional Certificate (or equivalent Board) of compartmental examination.
Schedule Tribe (ST) / Schedule Caste (SC) / Other Backward Class (OBC) certificates from revenue officer not below rank of Tahasildar / Additional Tahasildar.
PH/OH Certificate from CDMO of District / SDMO of Sub-Division / CMO of Capital Hospital.
Ex-Service Man (ESM) certificate from Zilla Sainik Board.
Serving Defence Personnel-SDP (Army / Navy / Air Force) Certificate from the Commanding Officer of the unit.
Permanent Resident / Nativity Certificate (for OSA & OLNS candidates).
NCC Certificate from the competent authority.
Scout & Guide certificate from the competent authority.
Sports Certificate from the Competent Authorities and counter signed by Director, Sports.
Migration Certificate for the applicant from Boards other than BSE, Odisha.
